content: What harm would it do if I were to go into the garden for a short time and enjoy myself among the trees and flowers, and the singing birds and fluttering butterflies and humming insects, and look at the dew-drops hiding from the sunbeams in the hearts of the roses and lilies, and wander about in the sunshine, instead of remaining all day in this room?
translations: ita:Che male farebbe se dovessi andare in giardino per un breve periodo di tempo e divertirmi tra gli alberi e fiori, e gli
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
